name: tvify
description: web app de busqueda para tv shows

scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/index.js > public/app.js
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run build-js && npm run jade && npm run stylus
scripts.start: npm run lint && npm run dist && npm run build && npm run serve
